questions.question: You are planning a vacation with friends. How do you contribute to the planning?
options: Design a informative and easy-to-use itinerary document.
Analyze past vacation data to pick the best destination.
Organize the trip details and solve any logistical issues.
Ensure all travel bookings and information are secure and legit.

questions.question: You are given the task of organizing a community event. What would be your main focus?
options: Creating a stunning webpage to promote the event.
Collecting and analyzing data on community preferences for the event
Implementing security measures to protect attendee information
Try to automate tasks/systems as much as possible like guest management/verification, a chatbot for assistance etc

questions.question: You are working on a group project for a school fair. Which role would you prefer?
options: Designing and setting up a visually appealing booth
Analyzing survey data to understand what attracts visitors
Solving technical problems to ensure everything works smoothly
Making sure all project materials are secure from tampering

questions.question: When faced with a challenging problem, how do you typically respond?
options: Look for creative and visually appealing solutions
Research and analyze the problem from all angles
Break it down into smaller, manageable parts
Think about potential risks and how to mitigate them

questions.question: You have been asked to improve the efficiency of your schoolâ€™s cafeteria. What do you do first?
options: I redesign the menu layout to make it more appealing and easier to read.
I analyze past sales data to see which meals are most popular.
I work on streamlining the order and payment processes and the security of the payment systems and student data.
I suggest using a smart system to predict food demand and reduce waste.

questions.question: Your friend wants to start a YouTube channel. How do you help them?
options: I create an attractive channel banner and thumbnails.
I research and analyze trends to choose the best topics and keywords.
I ensure their content and account are secure from hackers.
I explore automated tools for video editing and content creation which makes it easier

questions.question: What fascinated you the most, as a child?
options: Hacking into a website/app, cracking someone's password, exploiting game applications
Designing a base in Clash of Clans that was hard to beat.(likewise games)
Having a collection of different sized/shaped pebbles or other objects and keeping them systematically
Solving Rubics Cube, crosswords, sudoku or other brainstorming games.
